title: Oregon AFL-CIO Supports BOLI Advisory Opinion on Employment Status of Uber Drivers (Oregon AFL-CIO)
text: ( Source : Oregon AFL-CIO ) PORTLAND , OR - The Oregon Bureau of Labor and Industries (BOLI) that finds Uber drivers are employees, rather than independent contractors, under Oregon's labor laws. The Oregon AFL-CIO supports BOLI's opinion on
